topic.title: DECISION TO TREAT DATE (SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY DRUG REGIMEN)
topic.shortdesc: DECISION TO TREAT DATE (SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY DRUG REGIMEN) is the date that the consultation between the PATIENT and the CARE PROFESSIONAL took place where a decision was taken to treat a PATIENT with a Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Regimen.
